attributes.action: make illegal the levy on telephone bills to pay for other peoples internet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we the undersigned wish to petition the government not to introduce the levy on telephone bills to pay for internet for others,some people do not want internet.
we feel this is another "stealth tax". we keep hearing "BT" making huge profits, make them pay for it from the profits,they would then be able to re-invest in the internet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
